In this mode, this document is used in the assessment of conformance of the project to the declared and established environment. c) By an acquirer and a supplier — to help develop an agreement concerning processes and activities. Via the agreement, the processes and activities in this document are selected, negotiated, agreed to and performed. In this mode, this document is used for guidance in developing the agreement. d) By process assessors — to serve as a process reference model for use in the performance of process assessments that may be used to support organizational process improvement.
